subject: Sprains and Strains
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In their three games last week without Carmelo Anthony (sprained ankle), the Knicks, who will play at San Antonio on Thursday, lost by an average of 18.7 points.
snippet: In their three games last week without Carmelo Anthony (sprained ankle), the Knicks, who will play at San Antonio on Thursday, lost by an average of 18.7 points.
